message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which is tailored to meet your specific needs. Given its high value and quality, it's worth $120 to you. Considering its exceptional benefits, I would like to propose an offer of $110 for this product. This deal allows you to save $10 while securing a high-quality item that perfectly suits your requirements. I believe this is a fair and attractive offer that benefits both of us. Please let me know if you're interested in proceeding with this offer.
